text:
It works perfectly. I love the feature to instantly disable all active extensions and re-enable them whenever you need them with just a click.
I also enjoy the profiles feature.

What is missing, it ´ s a feature to organize or group the extension. For example, to put together extensions of the same type.
perfect extension! thanks.
cool
I've been using this for a few years. Best app. And must install this addon to save memory and cluttered menu bar icons even in the latest version of chrome.
Yeah.. this one makes it all worth it..

Been using this for YEARS! It's absolutely the best. Only hit one snag recently when my extension profiles disappeared, but the developer responded quickly and said to reload the extension. Worked like a charm! This is a MUST HAVE.
Without it, Chrome becomes a mess.
Probably my favourite extension.
Really helpful and time saving

I've been using this extension since early 2022 and now use it on all my Chrome profiles, and on multiple computers. I love this extension and believe it offers what should be a standard (developer) feature in any browser. If it ever goes away, I will be very, very sad.
The great simplicity and utility is the best that it has. Completely in love with this extension.
This extension is my most useful yet. I'm literally using it the whole time to toggle between extensions. Very great and I can definitely recommend!
AMAZING EXTENSION . THANK YOU

I was looking for something like that for a long time it only took me a quick search finally I don't have to go to the extension manager and disable what i don't want to use and go again and enable it's really frustration but with this extension it's amazing they have to make it available for the browser natively, but they don't.
Best Extension Manager Ever with 1 Click Enable Disable Feature
One star because Profile function doesn't work, but 4 stars otherwise.
Love it! Makes handling extensions a breeze. Super simple to use and keeps my extensions organized.
This is is the first extension i install after a clean and the one that never leaves my Browser
Perfect!
BEST extension manager PERIOD, nothing else to say!
great way to manage extensions
Nice!
superb useful & must have extension manager !
Great for stopping extensions from running in the background.
Super
Makes life easier. Works flawlessly . Its FREE. What more could you ask for?
This is a genius idea for an extension. Props to the developer(s).
I give it a 4 star because id like to be able to back up all the extensions placed in this to be able to use this across all browsers and accounts that I have.

Extensity is an exceptional Google Chrome extension that offers a wide range of features to enhance your browsing experience. With its ability to quickly enable and disable Chrome extensions, it provides unparalleled convenience and flexibility. Here's a detailed and comprehensive review of Extensity, highlighting its key features and benefits.

One of the most impressive aspects of Extensity is its ability to help you keep your browser lean and fast. With the vast array of extensions availab... Show more
It should be native in Chrome !!  It is one of the Top 5 Chrome Extensions, along with One Tab, uBlock Origin,  Linkclump and  'Copy All Urls '
help a lot. thanks founder
extremely simple. extremely useful
What it does is so simple, yet so useful. I've been using it for a while and felt like coming here just to rate it 5 stars, it deserves it! Keep the great work.
very usefull :)
Extremely useful! :) Thank you, developer!
Just op and too handy for chromium based browsers
Please add ability to sort the extensions by categories!
best best best. and super handy
undoubtedly necessary
All in One
literally the best
super helpful
Given that it's free and does all it boasts, you can't go wrong with this extension. It has saved me tons of time and battery life.
I am using this at school and it is actually really good! I recommend you to download it (If you know how to use it). Also, I wish it works with apps too.
awesome

It needs a Export or back up option.  like give us List generation so we can export the list and their icons and ideally a link with them to their pages. This way if i change browsers i can remember what i had.

I aint gon' even lie:
Whenever I have to re-install chrome for some reason (issues, new pc, etc.) extensity is my go to (as in: FIRST) plugin I'm looking for because I find that chrome gets "bogged down" when I have too many plugins installed, tabs open, etc. It eases the struggle that session/tab/memory managers face, typically because of the bloat.

I dig extensity so much that I've looked for it for other browsers when I feel I can't take chrome any more (to my dismay: Nothing).

All that ... Show more
ily dev

shopping, working, writing, creating, editing, etc. There's an extension for it, and with extensity I can easily adjust which of them are helpful actively running and which can just go to sleep. Is this available on safari, if not, can it be? GREAT WORK
This is something Chrome should make as a web page called(this is the web address they should make for the page): chrome://extention-manager
One of the most useful extensions that I can't live without. No idea why Chrome devs forgot to work on extension management page. Keep it up!
Super helpful and easy to use!
Light weight and does what you want
showw
fantastic extension management app
A must have extension in 2023

Something is messed up, I'm not sure what but it appears switching profiles doesn't actually work. I have two, one is secure browsing with most of the extensions installed are disabled and unsecure browsing with most of them enabled. Problem is switching profiles and the extensions remain in the state they were in no matter what. I'm forced to manually click them on/off. Pretty annoying. Another bug "Show Always On profile in the list" is unchecked and yet it appears in my profile anyway.
the best of its kind
Fantastic extension, really really helpful.
Legendary
The savior of all saviors
How do I rename profiles?
the best

Can remember running extensions
Cant delete other extensions

This is the absolute best 'extension management'- extension I've tried. However, the 'profiles' section could be improved a lot. Firslty, it should give you a warning "hey are you sure you want to switch profile and the current choice of extensions will be changed and lost (unless you have it saved) and can't be undone without having to do the manual work. Furthermore, I'd like to see profiles more as "groups" that could be added/removed by clicking them. Contrary to how it is now, where clic... Show more
Best. #1.
Absolutely brilliant!
5 stars If multiple Profiles can be active at once
Makes browser faster. Very useful extension..i just disabled many extensions with click of button.
so many things could be added. like pining and unpinning. show source code. show extension id
Very, very convenient, easy to use and perfect UI.
very useful and easy to use
Awesome. A Must Have. Thank you for this.
This extension is must have extension in browsers.
simply amazing,  simple to use and free.

Awesome extension.
There should be an "All" default profile, that enables all of your installed extensions. I can just make one that uses all of my extensions, but when I install a new extension, it isn't added to the profile automatically.
Wow, that's awesome
Thanks for this . This Really helps me

Thanks for your extension.
If you open chrome://extensions/shortcuts, from there it is possible to assign any new key shortcuts in order to automate how each extension should respond to them. 
I would really appreciate if you implement the option allowing users to switch between their different profiles by pressing shortcut keys. It seems way more convenient to do than extra mouse clicks in the address bar. 
Hope this helps.
Super useful if you have lots of extnesions, some of which you only use occasionally
When I install this add-on and visit the Ali Express website, the link is converted to an affiliate link
love this extension. very simple, very nice

• Installation was effortless 
• The UI is logical and uncluttered And most importantly? It does exactly what it says it does. It has brought some much needed zen to the chaos that was formerly my extension panel. Great work, dev! 

🍻 Dilly, dilly! (https://cutt.ly/3BaNr5y) 🍻
Does what its supposed to do, great extension!
this is so transparent that one can use all messy things at one place, this is a really helpful tool.
Very nice tool that does its job well.
Excellent extension - quick, practical, awesome!
Very nice extension.
best tool for all
Awesome! Even you can create profiles whatever you want. You can choose "always on" extensions(security, ad & tracker blocker extension etc.).
The only feature it is missing it URL-related rules like NooBoss or others. I still use this one the most though. 4.4 stars.
The perfect solution for managing extensions, thanks!
Super convenient and easy to use. Recommend it for everyone who uses extensions on chrome.

It's a quality of life improvement...
But its a shame it doesn't work on firefox due to extensions not being able to manage other extensions.
Amazing, fast, user friendly and does exactly what you need
Perfect. I can have as many extensions as I want without the need/worry to disable them when I dont need to

Excellent extensión, only missing:
- Backup (export/import)
- Ability to activate more than one profile
amazingly helpful. i use it all the time. thanks so much.
Gtreat Extension
recommended

Awesome extension.  Been using it for quite a few years now.   

My only wish is for the develepor to enable the editing of the names of the profiles we create, apart from being able to delete them.
Great Extension, my life depends on it, please never shut it down.
That was perfect extension!
Best extension to manage other extension, works cool and simple

basically perfect except for one flaw. 
when display config updates, the window shrinks and only the first 12 extensions are able to be disabled 
it comes back if you turn off the header and search bar, but only sometimes.
great extension for manage all extension and save ram
This is exactly what I was looking for.
Best extension on the store
One of the most helpful extensions for Chrome.
This is PERFECT! Tysm!!!
good

I love this extension!
Brilliant idea. The best extension I've discovered in a long time. Would be good if you could duplicate and rename profiles.

Awesome!
If you want to make your menu more confusing than ever, this app is for you---and not for me.
This is best extention , everyone should use this
Awesome

Excellent add-on.
I particularly like, that it is very compact - most similar extensions waste a lot of screen estate or show only short lists.
Options/settings are directly available from the drop down (no extra right click required).  
I would prefer even a longer list (currently about 60% of my screens height) to see as much stuff at once as possible.
Donated 5 USD / recommend to support this developer
Extensity really makes it so much easier than having to go into Chrome's Settings and search through for what you want on or off.

I stumbled upon this extension via active computer magazine. I would kindly thank the developer/s for creating a truly useful and easy to use extension tool.
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

A simple extension to turn your extensions off and on.
I tried it with Microsoft Edge works good but sometimes my Audio stuttering but maybe it's because of my 1 Million Tabs i'm currently reading.
Fantastic 9/10
thank you
incredibly useful
This is the best extensions manager ever.
Love it !!!
Perfect!

This is one of my top 3 extensions for Chrome. I can't recommend this utility enough, as anyone who knows me can attest. Especially useful when troubleshooting page load issues with content blockers and generally managing the intense memory hog that is Chrome.
This extension is really handy and very easy to use, it keeps my browser fast.
Convenient
awesome tool in your kit :) works perfectly
all I can say is thank you
Love this tool. Indispensable to me.
very nice
Amazing Extension Loved it
best extension manager

This the one extension to rule them all! I use a million different extensions, so Extensity is perfect for quickly toggling on/off the extensions I need. 

Feature Request: I would like to see is the ability to group extensions within the dropdown tab. I see that I can switch between specific groups of extensions using profiles, but it would be much better to be able to group them by my use case. I don't always need to turn off a specific group of extensions, but I do always want to quickly s... Show more
Awesome
Very Good!
it has a 5-star rating for a reason :)
Works and does what it promises.
Love the extension...simple and does the job well...Just a suggestion .. Is there any way to re-order extensions!

I had been looking for an extension manager that features addon set profiles for ages! 

Awesome! Will definitely donate.
My performances increased 90% thanks to it, multiplies profiles and auto sync across devices sounds worthy of 5 star to me.

there is a bug, not in the extension but in the webstore!!!!!

why aren't you using it yet
Awesome!!
Very easy to use and absolutely a must-have extension. Thank you so much Sergiokas.
Amazing - exactly what I needed (the ability to disable all extensions with one click, and reenable only those extensions again with one click)
Very helpful. Well done!
Thanks for making this

Fantastic extension, a must-have for every chrome/brave user! I only wish under each profile, the pin 'status' and pin position of each extension can be remembered so when you switch profiles you can view those activated extensions displayed seamlessly.
Simple, easy and effective extension for managing extensions.❤😀
neat and so much organised
Very useful 🥰
it is best extension ever. Thanks to developer.

It's great overall, and thanks a ton for this work, BUT it will be super sweet if you allow more then one profile to be enabled at the same time. 

0 Star just to take your attention. I will eddied it as soon as I see a reaction :)
as a totally new user, I love the easy visual interface, and use it basically just to switch on/off extensions, which it accomplishes flawlessly and gives user great ease!
Does an excellent job of tidying up my extensions, more than I could ever imagine.

Great extension! This allows you to make your pc faster! Just disable extensions that are not being currently used and bam, your pc becomes faster! There is just one suggestion and that is to have a dark mode for the extension or maybe even to make the UI a little bit more simple, but still this is a great extension for anyone!

Super Simple and most efficient. To the point.
Very easy to use.. Liked it, loved it and now stick to it

Fantastic. I hated how most browsers require you to jump through hoops just to quickly disable/enable browser extensions, so Extensity is exactly what I was looking for.

(I haven't ventured to profiles and whatnot as I don't see myself ever needing them at all; I've merely used this extension for the purpose of quickly enabling/disabling my browser extensions, so I guess you could say that my experience with Extensity is basic).
FANTASTIC, all features you can ask for. Great extension ! ...if only (in general) people were more aware of how to use browsers extensions... This one is A KEEPER for sure.
This was a really good extension and helps my browser lag because I have a lot of extensions!!!!

Best thing since fried okra.  Not only is it good for building sets of extensions (e.g. turn on all that GitHub stuff only when you're at GitHub), it's also a great boon for debugging. Make your "Always On" set of key privacy extensions, and then a "My Usual" set for everything you normally run with, and if there's some issue (e.g. an extension is doing search engine hijacking, or something is interfering with important elements of a site, like ability to submit a form), you can selectively d... Show more
Exactly what I needed. Thank you.

DAMN!!! 😲 How have I lived all this time without this? Everyday, I need to turn extensions on and off so I don't slow my browser depending on what I'm doing. I hate the process of having to open the "manage extensions" page, trying to find the one I'm looking for [I have a lot] just so I can turn it on/off. This saves  me a lot of time and headaches. It's on my list of best extensions.

Amazing Extension! It is a must to control memory issues. I use a ton of  extensions so every new tab suffers with performance. However if you don't need them you can disable them using the quick button on top or using different profiles based on your need.
great app

I have been using since a colleague recommended it. It has made browser life so much easier. I even have used it with chrome 49.0.2623.112 + extensity v1.10 still works as far back as win XP sp3, so thanks for backward compatibility helps when I want to play with an old "vintage" PC setup.
Perfect in every way

Great Extension
I have a lot of extensions and if you're like me than this is a must have
nice.
This extension is brilliant good job

Much better than others I've tried. 5 stars.

Really should be a built in feature in Chrome but thanks for taking the time to develope this.

Unfortunately, there's no keyboard toggle hotkey to control the on/off mode. It's a pain to have to click each time. Running js: vm.switch.flip() works, but it only works in the VM context of the extension.
One of the most useful extensions ever.  It makes management of extensions (and their pull on RAM) a total breeze.
wow works better than other extension disablers
Great extension...!!!
Just essential ! So much better now !
love it ❤❤❤

Using a few years in Chrome . pretty basic in a minimalist way. 
Easy to navigate. Best of those tried . Currently installed with Vivaldi .
This is a must have! just perfect
Thank you. Best Chrome extension. Even Google could not provide a simpler way to enable, disable or hide chrome extensions in a better way :-)

Works GREAT!
go app
nice!
Provides easy access to extension, bypassing Chrome's redirection to the Manage Extensions page.  Simple, effective on/off control of extensions,
Simply the best!
Let's me keep a clean bar, and have an easy way to add the extensions I need fast.

Very good, useful extension!  I started using it for a "sandbox" profile I created to try out and test extensions, there's so many and I don't want to bloat my usual profile, plus this way I can compare alternatives more easily. This extension fits right in and enables testing out groups of extensions quite easily. I also added it to my other profiles since it's useful to turn on/off those used less often or only sometimes.

Feedback / issues:

Soooo useful!!

I couldn't do without this extension - THANKS!
Great extension

Since I love this extension, I want to Add a Review.
I'm glad I found this Extension. As we all know that google chrome has a lot of extensions and they keep running in the background and Eat our PC RAM like crazy. With Extensity you can easily ON and OFF any extension you want in just 1 Click :)

Amazing extension. Simple and super useful. I LOVE the idea of the profiles! 🧡🧡🧡
I love it   !!!!

This is a hIghly impressive organizer. I have a lot (I mean A LOT) of Chrome extensions that I don't need to use all the time. This allows me to easily enable/disable depending on what I need, which helps keep my CPU and memory low on my Mac. Also, creating a 'Profile' makes it even more easy to manage.
ompfuna
very good

This is something that even latest google update feature can't hold a candle against it
This extention is a must for everyone, there is at least 20 extention worth installing, but having them run at the same time its like having 20 pages open, +2 gb ram but with this ... enable and disable when not needed and your Ram thanks you for it
Perfect!

There is an issue with the new update to Chromes extension picker and pinned extensions. When switching between profiles in Extensity, chrome resets the pins, so any extensions I need visible, I have to repin them each time I switch profiles.

Any way this can be avoided?
Since google chrome last update, the extension stopped to work and now google chrome has one extension shortcut to manage the extension in the bar, I dont want to use it, the extensity is better.
Love this extension. Simple, elegant, and does what it says.
I am so lucky for knowing this extension and it helps a lot for browsing all extensions at once i didn't find anything fault in this Extension!
I can't think about browsing internet without this. I use it every single day.

easy and quick on off for extensions and apps including some settings of extensions

Loved it
One of the most useful and consistent extensions ... it just works.
very useful for me.
A must have extension for me.
Works as expected. Very useful to have if you have lots of extensions installed.

I used Extensity to temporarily turn-off AdBlock Plus in Microsoft Edge Beta. When I turned Adblock Plus back on, the extension doesn't work properly anymore. I uninstalled and reinstalled Adblock Plus, but it appears that Adblock Plus is somehow *permanently* broken after using Extensity. This is probably a browser-specific issue, but it's pretty obvious that it was caused by Extensity.
nice extension so far
Excellent
omg a must if you use chrome just a little bit with extensions

Wonderful in its simplicity. I tried most of the others. Many were bloated, some did too little, and others were ugly. Extensity has been on my Chromebooks for a long time and there's been no reason to look for an alternative. It just works.
Super!!!
The Best!Must have.

Extensity is the best extension to easily toggle extensions and create different groups on profiles that you can immediately turn on or off.  Turn off extensions when you don't need them.  When you do want them, click the Extensity extension icon and you can immediately turn other extensions back on.

If you use more than 6 extensions, after you add Extensity, it will become an extension that you never want to remove from chrome.  By the end of the day, it's not uncommon that I have 10+ brows... Show more
Super, try the profiles option too
I highly recommend Extensity to anyone who has extensions that run constantly but aren't needed constantly. This extension needs to come included with Chrome browser in my opinion!
good

I am a developer and this extensions definitely helps keep things clean, neat and improves performance.

Love it.
I love it thank you!

Originally I heard about this extension through a tech webcast that I watch periodically. I installed it immediately and loved it. Then I never gave it another thought...until recently. I have been in the same computer environment for over a year and recently had to do a fresh OS install on a comp and of course that meant adding Chrome naked. I suddenly realized just how much I make use of this extension. It's an incredible tool to be able to use super convenient extensions that are also a nu... Show more

Exactly what I was looking for.
One Word "AWESOME...!!!!"  - perfect tool exactly what I was looking for, keep up the great work.
When I get a new computer or set up a new account, Extensity is the first extension I download. It is the hub I use to manage everything else.
Absolutely Fantastic Thanks All Team
Exactly what I needed. Thanks!
The extension is great, but what I'm missing in it is the direct link to Chrome webstore. Then it would be a 6 star extension.
Works great. Good design. They have optimized common tasks so that you can accomplish your task with very minimal input / clicks. Clearly, this was made by a real pro.
The profile option is simply wonderful: in 1 click I can  switch on/off the app I use for work or leisure. And even better: it's open source!

I use it daily, I could not use chrome without it, but the best part of it is that its open source (being able to switch profile is great ―save the CPU for other task). Thanks for sharing your work Sergiokas!
easy to use
just perfect !!!
Most valuable and a must have app when using the resource hogging Chrome.

@@@ ABSOLUTELY PHENOMENAL @@@

When I discovered Extensity, it was like a dream come true. I have 9 privacy extensions alone that often need to be toggled and it used to take me forever to go through Chrome's native menu to handle this. It was inefficient, slow, and a nuisance.

Extensity completely eliminated that problem for me and also solved my second problem to boot. Certain websites I visit only need certain extensions enabled. The answer is the Extensity "Profiles" feature! I can creat... Show more

I'm using this extension for developing an extension. The great thing about it is that I can easily switch between a development profile and my personal profile. So, as you might guess, the profiles are the most useful feature for me. I would love it even more if it would have remembered the positions of icons for extensions.
This is an immensely helpful tool. I love it.

Great stuff. I'm very happy this extension has the profile functionality. I have a ton of extensions that I use conditionally, and until now I was using different Chrome profiles to use certain extensions when I needed them. It was a pain because then I would need to copy-paste URLs into a new browser and start over. Thank you!

I am VERY pleased with this extension.  I use it many times a day!
Thank you very much!
Best extension ever!

the faster you install this, the more time you can save
simple and great confirmed!
Switching between profiles (Work, Learn, more) with only needed extensions improved my productivity and boosted Chrome performances. Excellent stuff.
very useful

The fastest way to switch on and off extensions. Great for who has a lot of them, but don't use them all the time
Absolutely necessary if you are a power user. Also helps when working on machines with relatively less memory. Extremely grateful to the developer.
Awesome extension, I love it.

Love it. Thanks you.

Can you remove syncing last used profile across multiple computers please.

For example, I have a profile called Work that I want to use at Work, and another called Home. 

Unfortunately If I enable Work profile at work, when I get home and open Chrome, this extension sync my last used profile to Chrome on my home computer. 

I want to use my Home profile at home and my Work profile at work, I dont want this extension autoswitching to my last used profile when I open Chr... Show more

Never thought I would review an extension on Google Chrome but here I am! This is an amazing tool. I'm a bit of a heavy extension user and this is extremely useful for cutting back on ram usage. The saved profiles feature is killer for implementing extension workflows too! I can finally have peace of mind that my computer will not freak out when I have a bunch of tabs open, programs running and Lightroom all at the same time. Best tool out there!

I run Chrome on several operating systems for different purposes.  This extension is amazing because, ex, some Chromebook-necessary extensions are meaningless on Mac. I've used this for years and it especially works wonders for development environments.  I can toggle framework-specific tools, or quickly remove all extensions to see if they are causing errors and not the app I'm building.

Make more things, person!
Works great! I have added more extension and able to access them with ease! Very helpful! Thanks!

Rated it 5-Star within 2 minutes after installation & just after 1st use
Worked Beautifully
This extension is very very good and useful! A more modern Menu/Gui for the extension would be Great! Thanks!

Very helpful.  Extensity has made it so that I can benefit from many more extensions than I otherwise would.  With extensity a whole universe of functionality is at hand when you need it, but out of the way when it's not needed.  Works as advertised and have never had any problems with.
Great idea, needs some refinement but overall job well done.
nice job!
This extension is awesome now i can manage my all extensions in one
and it's open source! Thanks for sharing your awesome work!

I find it is surprising one of my best extensions.  I love having a plethora of extensions at my disposal, but I don't always need them active at the same time, nor at times want them active at the same time.  This extensions solves that problem for me with ease.  In my opinion.
Useful!
Awsome
Extensity is a great extension that you should have on your browser.
friendly UI! easy to use! All is perfect, but! lack the function of REMOVING extensions!! 非常可惜！！
According to me, the best extension in chrome webstore.
best thing
Just perfect!, actually this is what I was looking for. Thank you.

I like it. I prefer how Custom Chrome and SimpleExtManager handle groups/profiles, but the extension does what it's designed to do, and does it well.

This is one of the most indispensable extensions I've used. I use it everyday. I use a lot of different extensions for different things, and I can't have them all running at once because it would slow down my browser too much. With this, I just turn them on and off as I need them. If I had to go to the extensions page and do that every time, it would really suck. This is a lifesaver, and I've never had any problems with it working properly.
Really well designed and excellent app.

WoW! A "Must Have" for Chrome users, as Chrome is a powerful but memory hungry browser. 
Extensity allows you to load a plethora of nifty extensions without occupying RAM space. Keep many of them off and use only the extensions you require in a particular situation with One-click enable-disable. Nifty!
Thanks Sergio. xxx

This is one of the most used extensions in my list, apart from my mouse gestures and ad-block extensions. 
Chrome is a memory hungry browser, this enables me to use only the required extension in a particular situation and disable the others, whilst keeping everything. 
Further, this enables you to experiment with the extensions. Very user-friendly way of activating and deactivating extensions with just a click, is a key advantage of this over the other extension managers.

I keep bouncing between Extensity and One-Click Extensions Manager. 

If Extensity had two features, it would be a hands-down unequivocal winner.

1. 1-click 'Disable All Extensions'
2. 1-click Groups or Profile manager

I like the idea of profiles better. I need one set of extensions for everything, one for business development, and one for watching YouTube, etc.
